meanings.definition: A painful, pus-filled bump on the skin caused by an infected hair follicle.
meanings.sent1: The furuncle on his neck was red and swollen.
meanings.sent2: She went to the doctor to get treatment for the furuncle on her arm.
meanings.sent3: The furuncle decided to show up right before her big event.
meanings.sent4: The furuncle was like a tiny volcano ready to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing pain of the furuncle made it hard to sleep at night.

meanings.definition: To develop or cause a furuncle.
meanings.sent1: If you don't keep the wound clean, it may furuncle.
meanings.sent2: The infection furuncled quickly after the injury.
meanings.sent3: His procrastination caused the situation to furuncle into a bigger problem.
meanings.sent4: The tension between them furuncled into a heated argument.
meanings.sent5: Neglecting the issue allowed it to furuncle into a major crisis.
